name: Open Third Person MAKER
description:
Open Third Person MAKER is an atempt for making game devolopment and modding a bit easyer for benigners, it consists on some .blend files (use this software for editing the files: https://www.blender.org/ ) and a demo. Inside the files you will find an example project and some assets porgrammed for making third person games like:

-A playermodel with third person shooter control script included

-Basic enemy assets programmed with a simple AI

-Particle effects

-A simple map example

All the asets are made using the blender logic bricks system, this project at the moment is just a very simple idea but if you support it, this can become a big thing.

If you have any questions or need help with something ask me in the coments.

BY THE WAY:

As long as you put a link to your project made with this in the coments you can do whatever you whant with this project: Use hatsune miku as a playermodel and the FNAF models as the enemies in a minecraft map or whatever you want its 100% open
